TopicTitle: Space Odyssey: Voyage to the Planets

Articles.Content:
I saw this mini-series on Netflix the other day. It's awesome, It's a fictional documentary about a manned grand tour through the solar system. It seems to be a based on what humans could do with current technologies and lots and lots of Funds. I couldn't stop thinking about how Kerbal the entire voyage seems(aerobraking through Jupiter was awesome).

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Space_Odyssey_(TV_series)

Hope someone else finds this as cool as I did!
They have it on Netflix? How cool!

They have it on Netflix? How cool!

Yup, Netflix instant too. I don't bother with discs anymore.
It's on YouTube in its entirety as well. I would love to see the purported specs on the Venus lander they used, stopped watching after that.
